sentences.en: ...a short checklist of much that is modish at the moment.
Brief figuring style, neat and spiffy prints in and fashionable narrow design show your modish feelings.
sentences.cn: 简洁的修身版型, 干净利落的前胸印字,加上现今流行的窄门筒设计,给人以斯文的时髦感觉.

sentences.en: Rhoda's willowy figure, modish straw hat, and fuchsia gloves and shoes surprised Janice.
sentences.cn: 罗达的苗条身材, 时髦的草帽, 紫红色的手套和鞋使杰妮丝有些惊讶.

sentences.en: She is always crazy at modish things .
She is always crazy at modish things.
They also favor the natural and contemporary floral bouquet that are fashionable and modish.
sentences.cn: 他们还喜欢自然的,富有现代感的,时尚新潮的花束.

trans.tran_en: modish ideas, designs etc are modern and fashionable
